Package: sk.hax.software.os.command

[Groovy] Class Rshd

      • sk.hax.software.os.command.Rshd

      • Remote shell daemon (rshd). Basically a more specific implementation if the remote task daemon (rtaskd), with the created task being the Hax shell.

        Authors:
        mio
        See Also:
        Rtaskd
